readings.text:
M'bott is a frog that really likes photography. He is always looking for new opportunities to take photos.

While he was at the party, he kept taking photos of all guests, including Leuk the rabbit, Gaynde the lion and Golo the baboon.

The only guest he could not photograph was himself!

questions.question: Who is the only guest that M'bott could not photograph?

readings.text:
Golo the baboon had the special task of preparing all the food needed for the party.

It was a lot of food to cook, so he asked Thioye the parrot for some help.

Golo needed some ingredients but he was in a hurry, so he asked Thioye to get some bananas, peas, and tomatoes from the local market

questions.question: Which of these ingredients Golo needed?

readings.text:
Everytime Gaynde the lion has to feed his cubs he always has the same problem.

They are a lot of cubs and they always change their minds about what food they like.

Yesterday they wanted apples but today they want bananas!

questions.question: What food do the cubs want to eat today?

readings.text:
Tarabu the panther has a band with some of her friends. She and Thioye the parrot are the singers, Gaynde the lion plays the drums and Golo the baboon plays the guitar.

Fudu the turtle used to play the bass guitar, but when he lost his glasses he could not keep playing and had to leave the band.

questions.question: Who had to leave the band?

failureFeedback.text: Almost! Try reading the text again
Hmmm, I am not sure that's the correct answer
